name: Quests Unlimited
description: Quests Unlimited is inspired by a love for classic idle games like Progress Quest. Quests Unlimited is a classical interpretation of the idle rpg genre with a more traditional rpg style of gameplay being emulated.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP SP2+ Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 320 MB available space
